DOC.brief_title: Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Guideline Adherence - A Quality Improvement Study
DOC.criteria: Providers : All primary care provider Wade Park Veterans Affairs Medical Center ( VAMC ) eligible study Patients : Receive primary care provider Wade Park VAMC Have : CKD define estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) less 60 two separate occasion 90 730 day apart , diabetes , OR hypertension Endstage renal disease Renal transplant recipient Less 18 year age July 1 , 2009 No primary care visit Jan 1 , 2008 July 1 , 2009
